dc_title_s: Carte hydrographique de la Moyenne égypte : ou sont indiqué les travaux exécuter d'prés les orderes de Son Altesse Méhémet-Ali Vice-Roi d'égypte, avec le project de la communication directe des mers au traverse de l'Isthme
dc_creator_sm: Linant de Bellefonds, L.-M.-A. (Louis Maurice Adolphe), 1799-1883
dc_description_s: Shows roads and water systems, either for irrigation or transportation.; Relief shown by hachures.; Map was produced, upon Vicory of Egypt and Sudan (Muhammad Said Pasha, Muhammad Ali's fourth son) orders in occasion of linking the Red Sea and the Mediterranean Sea by the Suez Canal. Shows administative division of Middle Egypt: I. Gizé (Jizah)-- II. Fayoum (Fayyum) -- III. Bénésouef (Bani Suwayf)-- IV. Fechen et Béné-nesar (or al Fashn, part of Bani Suwayf) -- V. Miniet (Minya).; Includes geographical notes.; Copy has ms. annotations.|92 x 62 centimeters|Scale 1:250,000|General Map Collection
dc_publisher_s: Dépo?t de Général de la Guerre (Paris)
